justification: Identifies B’s rookie/SoS interests but misreads needs: Josh Garcia (rookie, friendly playoff schedule) fits B’s preferences, so B is unlikely to sell for a Tier 3 TE with low usage consistency and a Tier 5 RB. Calling Isaiah Adams a ‘low-volatility TE upgrade’ is inaccurate versus B’s Adam Allen (Tier 2) and Walker (Tier 1, albeit hurt). Offer also mismatches A’s conservative preference for workhorse RBs. Rationale is concise but not evidence-based; acceptance probability is overestimated.
